metadata.title: CVE-2021-21154 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in Tab Strip in Google Chrome prior to 88.0.4324.182allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
